item.title: Where can i download JAVA applet JDK to write program compile and run
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

Use JBuilder.

Everything is case sensitive, just to let you know.
So, the class name has to be the EXACT same everywhere.

public class Hello {
public static void main(String[] args) {
System.out.println(“Hello pen0r”);
}
}

then to compile:
@echo off
javac *.java
pause

then to run:
@echo off
java -cp . Hello
pause

Read full topic

item.title: Where can i download JAVA applet JDK to write program compile and run
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

Save that as .java

Then make a bat like this

@echo off
javac -cp *.java
pause

That will compile it.

To run, I think this would work

@echo off
java hello
pause

Read full topic
